expression_function_GroupName_functionna.caption: The label of the screenshot
expression_function_GroupName_functionna.img: file without extension in expression help image folder - takes precedence over algfile
expression_function_GroupName_functionna.alg_img: file without extension in algorithm img folder

expression_function_GeometryGroup_affine.caption: Vector point layer (green dots) before (left), and after (right) an affine transformation (translation).

expression_function_GeometryGroup_bounda.caption: Boundary (black dashed line) of the source polygon layer

expression_function_GeometryGroup_bounds.caption: Black lines represent the bounding boxes of each polygon feature

expression_function_GeometryGroup_buffer.caption: Buffer (in yellow) of points, line, polygon with positive buffer, and polygon with negative buffer
Buffering line features using the m value on the vertices

expression_function_GeometryGroup_centro.caption: The red stars represent the centroids of the features of the input layer.

expression_function_GeometryGroup_densif.caption: Red points show the vertices before and after the densify
Densify geometry at a given interval

expression_function_GeometryGroup_line_i.caption: Interpolated point at 500m of the beginning of the line

expression_function_GeometryGroup_offset.caption: In blue the source layer, in red the offset one

expression_function_GeometryGroup_single.caption: Left versus right side buffer on the same vector line layer

expression_function_GeometryGroup_smooth.caption: Increasing number of iterations causes smoother geometries
